name: SuccUla (CheapGrams Jam)
description:
SuccUla by Eero Höök (Roikku)

Quick How To:

Press F to feed. WASD/Arrows to move. Bump into people to check if they are a human or not. If red eyes flash, don't feed on them, because they're another vampire. Only humans drop Garlic on the ground, so if you see Garlic popping up, there's a human nearby to feed upon.

Notes: Quick spaghetti so there may be bugs.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move

F - Bite (only bite humans with blue eyes)

CheapGrams' Bleeding Heart Jam 2023

entry by Eero Höök, made in GameMaker (GMS2)

Theme: Blood / Vitality is Scarce

Theme usage: You are Dracula and you are thirsty. Drink human blood to not let your life drain out. The mandatory pick-up item in the game is Garlic, and you should try to avoid it as it stuns you temporarily, and your life keeps forever draining.

Genre: 2D Puzzle Assasination game

Features:

- All design, programming, art by the author.

- Audio from Author that do not require credits.

- Simplistic gameplay.

Support the Dev:

paypal.me/roikkudev
